title: ping 60 in loading screen, ping 2129 (999) when the game starts
body:
3 games ago i received an error message telling me i can't connect, check firewall, despite firewall being off. since then each game I've been in my net starts lagging immensely, however as soon as game is over my net returns too 10mbps, while during game it's 0.2mbps.
Something is definitely causing this. Only happens with league.

replies.body: I have the exact same problem except that my internet is fine, only league is the thing that's suffering from terrible ping

This could explain a lot of issues other people have been having once we get to the bottom of this.

Who's your ISP, what's your OS?

http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/

What does this tool have to say about your internet?

And you say that it's stopped lagging. Is that still true?
no lag today so far though
